DOC.brief_summary: This study conduct Europe . The aim observational study investigate effect switch basal insulin treatment Levemir® body weight obese diabetic patient . A local extension conduct Slovenia order reach plan 400 patient sub-analysis Slovenian patient . Included study retrospective part evaluate weight progress since initiation insulin treatment another basal insulin and/or oral antidiabetic drug ( OAD ) and/or bolus insulin therapy . Retrospective data collect baseline approximately 6 12 month start insulin detemir therapy .
DOC.brief_title: Observational Study Levemir® Obese Diabetic Patients
DOC.criteria: Diabetes mellitus ( Type 1 type 2 ) BMI great 27 kg/m^2 , 3 kg weight increase since start insulin therapy Subjects currently treat insulin detemir Subjects previously enrol study ; Subjects hypersensitivity insulin detemir excipients . Women pregnant , breast feeding intention become pregnant within next 12 month Female patient remind use adequate contraceptive study , relevant .
